description.en: Transcodium aims to provide the first peer-to-peer decentralized file editing, transcoding and distribution platform with high quality and reliable computational power at a very affordable price. This will create a global market for users, willing to rent their idle machines to be used as workers. Further, at the end of the processing, the worker (processor) will be rewarded with the TNS Tokens.

ico_data.short_desc: Transcodium is the World's first transcoding platform
ico_data.description: Transcodium aims to provide the first peer-to-peer decentralized media transcoding, editing and distribution platform with high quality and reliable computational power at a very affordable price. Transcodium will use idle devices to process file which will create a global market for users, willing to rent their idle machines to be used as workers. The global video streaming software market size is expected to grow from USD 3.25 Billion in 2017 to USD 7.50 Billion by 2022. 87% of online marketers use video content which shows how this Industry will grow in near future.

status_updates.description:
Tech start-up, Transcodium has released a new web version of its wallet app, TNS WirePurse on Aug. 28, allowing Android users to access their digital wallets online now. This forms their first milestone achievement. The company will also organize an airdrop for all the users of WirePurse on September 10th, 2019.

Transcodium plans to win users over at the same time rewarding their loyal users with the additional launch of its airdrop seven days later.
#Transcodium's wallet TNS #Wirepurse is now live on playstore, the app has successfully passed beta to production stage.
